app.title: MBTI Coaching Platform

home.subtitle: Coming Soon
home.assessmentDescription: Discover your personality type through comprehensive MBTI assessment
home.coachingDescription: Get personalized coaching session with certified coach

hero.title: Discover Your True Personality Type
hero.subtitle: Take our scientifically validated MBTI assessment and unlock deep insights about yourself

benefits.title: Why Take This Assessment?
benefits.benefit1: Understand your unique strengths and preferences
benefits.benefit3: Make better career and life decisions

q1.question: When you need to recharge your vitality, you tend to:
q1.optionA: Spend time with friends or engage in social activities that energize me
q1.optionB: Take time alone to reflect, read, or pursue personal interests

q2.question: When dealing with the world around you, you prefer:
q2.optionA: Focus on concrete facts, practical details, and what's happening now
q2.optionB: Explore possibilities, patterns, and what could be in the future

q3.question: When making important decisions, you rely primarily on:
q3.optionA: Logic, objective analysis, and rational thinking
q3.optionB: Personal values, empathy, and how it affects people

q4.question: Your preferred lifestyle is one that allows you:
q4.optionA: To have things planned, organized, and decided in advance
q4.optionB: To stay flexible, spontaneous, and keep options open

interim.title: Your Preliminary Results
interim.subtitle: Based on your core responses
interim.error: Failed to calculate interim results. Please try again.
interim.chooseFormat: Choose your assessment format to continue.

format.title: Choose Your Assessment Format
format.subtitle: Select the question style that resonates with you

scenarios.title: Life Choice Scenarios
scenarios.description: Real-world situations where you choose between two responses
scenarios.questionStyle: Practical life situations with binary choices
scenarios.resultFocus: How you apply your personality in daily life

traits.title: A/B Personality Traits
traits.description: Direct comparisons between personality trait pairs
traits.questionStyle: Clear trait comparisons with forced choice

sais.title: SAIS Methodology
sais.resultFocus: The depth and balance of your preferences
